name: Hospice Care of South Carolina, LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Hospice Care of South Carolina, LLC is a Hospice Care, Community Based provider based in Spartanburg, SC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $57.7M in Medicaid payments across 24K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $57.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
